name: Dot Way Out
description:
What would happen if you stopped time?

Dot Way Out is a puzzle game based on time-freeze feature in which you must find your way to dodge the bullets.

In the game, if you stop, you may jump into bullet-time, which causes the game to temporarily move in slow-motion, making it easier for the player to dodge.

Features:

Bullet-time / Slow motion effects.
54 levels
old school electronic genre
